query.const: query Affiliations($name: String!){ affiliations(name: $name) { totalCount nextCursor items { id displayName uri } } }
query.default: query Affiliations($name: String!){ affiliations(name: $name) { totalCount nextCursor items { id displayName uri } } }

query.const: query Licenses($term: String, $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ license(term: $term, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description } } }
query.default: query Licenses($term: String, $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ license(term: $term, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description } } }

query.const: query MetadataStandards($term: String, $keywords: [String!], $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ metadataStandards(term: $term, keywords: $keywords, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description keywords } } }
query.default: query MetadataStandards($term: String, $keywords: [String!], $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ metadataStandards(term: $term, keywords: $keywords, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description keywords } } }

query.const: query Repositories($term: String, $keywords: [String!], $repositoryType: String, $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ repositories(term: $term, keywords: $keywords, repositoryType: $repositoryType, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description website keywords repositoryTypes } } }
query.default: query Repositories($term: String, $keywords: [String!], $repositoryType: String, $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ repositories(term: $term, keywords: $keywords, repositoryType: $repositoryType, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description website keywords repositoryTypes } } }

attributes.help: Enter the title of this research output
Provide a brief description of this research output
Select the type that best describes this research output
Select any data flags that apply to this research output
The initial access level for the research output
The anticipated release date for the research output
The size of the research output in bytes

graphQL.query: query Repositories($term: String, $keywords: [String!], $repositoryType: String, $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ repositories(term: $term, keywords: $keywords, repositoryType: $repositoryType, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description website keywords repositoryTypes } } }

attributes.help: Select repositor(ies) you would prefer users to deposit in

graphQL.query: query MetadataStandards($term: String, $keywords: [String!], $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ metadataStandards(term: $term, keywords: $keywords, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description keywords } } }

attributes.help: Select metadata standard(s) you would prefer users to use

graphQL.query: query Licenses($term: String, $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ license(term: $term, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description } } }

attributes.help: Select license(s) you would prefer users to apply to the research output
